title: SYSTEM FUNCTIONAL TEST
fullText:
The overall function of the complete system shall be tested. The tests performed and the results shall be recorded in the on-site documentation.
All input sources should provide charge to the battery bank.
Power shall be available to connected d.c. and a.c. loads.
RCDs shall be tested. (See AS/NZS 3000 for advice on testing with non-sinusoidal wave forms).
NOTE: Attention is drawn to Appendix B and issues with RCDs.
